name: AvatarCog
author: Your Name
long: A Red Bot cog to retrieve user avatars as attachments with the command `avatar @username`.
install_msg: To use this cog, load it with the following command:
Replace `[p]` with your Red Bot prefix.

commands.name: avatar
commands.description: Retrieve user avatar as an attachment.

credits: Credit to Your Name for creating this cog.
